mapper.select: select *, timestampdiff(day, lastDate, now()) as deleteDiff from memberS order by startDate desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select *, timestampdiff(day, lastDate, now()) as deleteDiff from memberS where m_group=#{m_group} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from memberS where datediff(startDate,now()) > -7;
select count(*) from productSaleS where statement='QUOTE';
select count(*) from consultingS where completeDate is null;
select deleteReason,reasonDetail, count(*) as reasonCnt from deleteMember where deleteReason between 1 and 6 group by deleteReason;
select date_format(startDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as joinDate, count(*) as joinCnt from memberS group by date_format(startDate,'%Y-%m-%d');
select count(*) from reportS;

select r.*, datediff(r.rpDate, now()) as date_diff, b.idx as fbIdx, b.title as fbTitle, b.content as fbContent, b.mid as fbMid, q.idx as qtIdx, q.title as qtTitle, q.content as qtContent, q.mid as qtMid, c.idx as rcIdx, c.title as rcTitle, c.content as rcContent, c.mid as rcMid from reportS r left join freeBoardS b on b.idx = r.boardIdx and r.board='freeBoard' left join questionBoardS q on q.idx = r.boardIdx and r.board='questionBoard' left join recruitBoardS c on c.idx = r.boardIdx and r.board='recruitBoard' order by r.rpDate desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

select r.* , b.idx as fbIdx, b.title as fbTitle, b.content as fbContent , q.idx as qtIdx, q.title as qtTitle, q.content as qtContent , c.idx as rcIdx, c.title as rcTitle, c.content as rcContent from reportS r left join freeBoardS b on b.idx = r.boardIdx and r.board='freeBoard' left join questionBoardS q on q.idx = r.boardIdx and r.board='questionBoard' left join recruitBoardS c on c.idx = r.boardIdx and r.board='recruitBoard' where r.idx = #{idx};
select count(*) from asRequest;
select count(*) from asRequest where ${search} like concat('%',#{searchString},'%');
select count(*) from consultingS;
select count(*) from consultingS where ${search} like concat('%',#{searchString},'%');
SELECT *, datediff(writeDate, now()) AS date_diff FROM consultingS WHERE ${search} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchString},'%') ORDER BY idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from consultingS where idx = #{idx};
select * from noticeS where popup = 'OK';
select * from noticeS where important = 'OK';
select count(*) from noticeS where important = 'NO';
select count(*) from noticeS where important = 'NO' and ${search} like concat('%',#{searchString},'%');
SELECT *, datediff(writeDate, now()) AS date_diff FROM noticeS WHERE important='NO' AND ${search} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchString},'%') ORDER BY idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select *, datediff(writeDate,now()) as date_diff from noticeS where idx=#{idx};
select count(*) from asRequest r, asCharge c where c.asIdx=r.idx and c.statement='COMPLETE' and r.progress='PAYMENT';
mapper.insert: insert into consultingS values(default, #{vo.part}, #{vo.name}, #{vo.email}, #{vo.phone}, #{vo.title}, #{vo.content}, default, null, null);
mapper.update: update memberS set level=2 where mid = #{mid};
update productSaleS set statement=#{statement} where idx = #{idx};
update consultingS set completeDate = now(), answer=#{answer} where idx=#{idx};
update noticeS set popup='NO' where popup='OK';
update noticeS set part=#{vo.part}, title=#{vo.title}, content=#{vo.content}, popup=#{vo.popup}, endDate=#{vo.endDate}, important=#{vo.important} where idx=#{vo.idx};
mapper.delete: delete from freeBoardS where idx = (select boardIdx from reportS where idx = #{idx});
delete from questionBoardS where idx = (select boardIdx from reportS where idx = #{idx});
delete from recruitBoardS where idx = (select boardIdx from reportS where idx = #{idx});
delete r1 from reportS r1 join (select boardIdx from reportS where idx = #{idx}) r2 on r1.boardIdx=r2.boardIdx;
